content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal experience with restaurants or cafes in Uxbridge, but here are some popular recommendations for local dining options:

- Lumbini Nepalese Restaurant: This restaurant serves authentic Nepalese and Indian cuisine and is known for its delicious curries and momos. - The Rusty Bike Cafe: This cozy cafe is located near the Grand Union Canal and serves homemade cakes, pastries, and sandwiches. They also offer a selection of vegan and gluten-free options. - The Good Yarn: This traditional pub serves classic British fare, such as fish and chips and bangers and mash, as well as a selection of beers and ales. - The Oxford Arms: This gastropub offers modern British cuisine with a focus on locally sourced ingredients. They also have an extensive wine list and a great selection of real ales. - Hillingdon Prince: This hotel restaurant serves a variety of dishes, including classic pub food, steaks, and international cuisine. They also offer a Sunday roast and a selection of cocktails. These are just a few options for dining in Uxbridge, but there are many more great restaurants and cafes to explore. Make sure to do some research beforehand and ask locals for their recommendations!
